question.text: The title of the c64 classic CREATURES stands for...
question.a1: Crafty Reasonable External Abbreviations Top Ugly Resident Evil Speedboats
question.a2: Creatures Rule Earth And The Terror Unleashes Raging Evil Slime
question.a3: Cylons Reach Earth And The Universe Riots Each Star
question.a4: Clyde Radcliff Exterminates All The Unfriendly Repulsive Earthridden Slime
question.creator: Tobias Eilert
